mapper.select: SELECT jjlxtjb.tjrq,sum(jjlxtjb.jjsl)as jjsl,jjlxdmb.jjlxmc as jjlxdm FROM REC_JJLXTJB jjlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_JJLXDMB jjlxdmb ON jjlxtjb.jjlxdm=jjlxdmb.jjlxdm WHERE tjrq=#{tjTime} group by jjlxtjb.jjlxdm,jjlxtjb.tjrq,jjlxdmb.jjlxmc

SELECT sum(jjlxtjb.jjsl)as jjsl ,jjlxtjb.tjrq,jjlxdmb.jjlxmc as jjlxdm from REC_JJLXTJB jjlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_JJLXDMB jjlxdmb ON jjlxtjb.jjlxdm=jjlxdmb.jjlxdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by jjlxtjb.jjlxdm ,jjlxtjb.tjrq,jjlxdmb.jjlxmc ORDER BY jjlxtjb.tjrq desc

SELECT sum(jjlxtjb.jjsl)as jjsl ,jjlxtjb.tjrq,jjlxdmb.jjlxmc as jjlxdm from REC_JJLXTJB jjlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_JJLXDMB jjlxdmb ON jjlxtjb.jjlxdm=jjlxdmb.jjlxdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by jjlxtjb.jjlxdm ,jjlxtjb.tjrq,jjlxdmb.jjlxmc ORDER BY jjlxtjb.tjrq desc

SELECT xzqh.xzqhmc as xzqhdm, sum(jjlxtjb.jjsl)as jjsl ,jjlxtjb.tjrq,jjlxdmb.jjlxmc as jjlxdm from REC_JJLXTJB jjlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_JJLXDMB jjlxdmb ON jjlxtjb.jjlxdm=jjlxdmb.jjlxdm LEFT JOIN DICT_XZQHB xzqh ON SUBSTR(xzqh.xzqhdm,1,4)=jjlxtjb.xzqhdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by jjlxtjb.jjlxdm ,jjlxtjb.tjrq,jjlxdmb.jjlxmc,xzqh.xzqhmc ORDER BY jjlxtjb.tjrq desc

SELECT xzqh.xzqhmc AS xzqhdm,jjlxtjb.jjsl AS jjsl,jjlxtjb.tjrq,jjlxdmb.jjlxmc AS jjlxdm FROM REC_JJLXTJB jjlxtjb LEFT JOIN DICT_JJLXDMB jjlxdmb ON jjlxtjb.jjlxdm=jjlxdmb.jjlxdm LEFT JOIN DICT_XZQHB xzqh ON SUBSTR(xzqh.xzqhdm,1, 4)=jjlxtjb.xzqhdm WHERE tjrq between #{startTime} and #{endTime} AND jjlxtjb.xzqhdm=#{xzqhdm}
